resources.string:
Rise, Tarnished, and be guided by grace to bran dish the power of the elden Ring and become anElde Lord in the Lands Between.
 
 In the Lands Between ruled by Queen Marika the Eternal, the Elden Ring, the source of the Erdtree, has been shattered.
